website_summaries.verdict: The Yonex Power Cushion 47 has many laudable qualities, including the bouncy Power Cushion midsole and the sticky rubber outsole. The lightweight and breathable top also contributes to the player's comfort.If it wasn't for the lack of durability, the shoe would have scored even higher for its performance on the court.
pros: Both long-time and new badminton players applaud the comfort offered by the Power Cushion 47
Many consumers consider the price of this Yonex badminton shoe to be budget-friendly
The grippy outsole has impressed a lot of athletes because it allowed them to move fast on the court
Multiple testers feel that their ankles are supported while wearing this model
The lightweight nature of the trainer is a quality adored by more than a few people
cons: A considerable number of Power Cushion 47 owners have complained that it is not durable
the upper tore and the outsole detached after a few weeks of use
Several wearers have experienced numbness in their toes after wearing this badminton trainer for a few hours

customer_reviews.title: A poor example of the Yonex brand
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about these, on the first use the blue started to rub off (I think it must be sprayed on). We will see how they last but do not have high hopes. I replaced the soles instantly with a quality product to add protection. Good value to get the Yonex brand, but not sure it's up to the standard of my prior Yonex products. Update; these have fallen apart after a few more plays and I'm trying to contact Amazon to arrange a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Max P

customer_reviews.title: Different shoes to the picture advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bit disappointed because the trainers received are not the ones in the advertised picture. The ones in the picture looked very sturdy which is important to me. I will keep these though as they are a good fit. But the seller needs to be more careful with the advertising details in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Checkerz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes though I did have to stop factoring in slide when moving around the court. Hadn't realised how much grip my old ones had lost! I've had these for nearly a year and they are still comfortable. The fabric over the insole has come away a little bit in the left shoe, however they do get a fair bit of hammer as we play at least three times a week at a competitive level.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Grace Coverdale

customer_reviews.title: Good cushioning and comfort: Received earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are exactly as described - received a few days earlier than estimated too, which was a bonus! They are a tad smaller than the usual sizes (but I heard Yonex in general are like this), so if not used to Yonex, you may wish to buy half a size bigger than your usual size. They really feel comfy and absorbs the force of jumping and sudden movements on the court. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chun

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, light-weight
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for volleyball, I play at a regional level - so training once a week, play once a week. Good fit, light-weight, and decent cushioning. I play middle blocker, so do a lot of jumping - this is an important factor for me. Have played on 3 different indoor courts. so far, and traction is also pretty good on all 3 surfaces. Overall ankle stability is decent. I've previously worn Mizuno, and Adidas volleyball shoes - so far, these have proved as good - if not better, especially in terms of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: They stitching came undone after circa 6 hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: I am very concerned about the quality of these shoes, after playing in practice for about 6 hours I noticed the mesh had come away from the shoes due to the stitching coming undone, as per the photos. I will update the review if I get a new pair of better quality. I have spoken to Amazon and have been informed they are currently investigating.
customer_reviews.author: W. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality yonex badminton shoes. Seems to provide good support for the ankles. Haven’t tried them in earnest yet
customer_reviews.author: Exangus

customer_reviews.title: Yonex Badminton Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have worn and used Yonex Badminton Shoes for many years. Firstly to play Badminton, but they are so comfortable that I wear them for everyday use now. YC Sports in Cardiff has the best range. Great service and great quality. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Allan David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just the job!
customer_reviews.text: Yep, these do the job. I'm a keen Badminton player, and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy. Do look cheaply made in areas and insole is not fixed in well but they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes sizing was a bit of a guess though
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Badminton shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected a little thin and longer than the previous model I had.
customer_reviews.author: Fari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome utility value. I am not getting any knee or ankle pain after wearing this pair
customer_reviews.author: what is a pen name  ?

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worn once and started to delamination after game of badminton
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. 9.5 size is just right. I normally wear size 9
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Hoten

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A little tight fitting for my usual size I get. Uncomfortable near the big toe area when running around the badminton court. It blackened my toe because the lip inside kept catching on it as I was breaking sharply running back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Ps Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes, look slick and they are light and the mobility feels great while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with size 7 whilst playing my right toe is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with size 7 whilst playing my right toe is hitting to the front edge of the shoe causing discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My big toes get caught on an internal seam, lifting them during play. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: jumadu

product_meta.title: YONEX Men's Power Cushion 35 Badminton Shoes
product_meta.description: A key feature of all Yonex footwear, the Yonex power cushion absorbs shock then reverses the impact energy for smooth transfer into the next movement. Verification: when dropped from7 above a power cushion sheet, an egg will bounce Back4 without damage.
feature_bullets: Affordable shoe with reliable traction Cushioning for the feet and joints. Absorbs shock then reverses the impact energy
